cleaned_text: Add it to your wishlist to revisit it later, or share it with the world. Made by Yoke Vata Aromatherapy Multi-Purpose Oil provides luxurious hydration. This synergistic combination helps to detox and cleanse the body, while also supporting a deeply restorative and replenishing self-care ritual. These essential oils are balancing for vata and included in the aromatherapy blend as they are sweet, soothing and warming: Orange, Bergamot, Patchouli, Ylang Ylang. Put 3-4 drops of oil in the palm of the hand. Rub your hands together and rub on skin to hydrate and nourish. Free of Toxins: Paraben-Free, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, synthetic fragrance. Made by Yoke is rooted in the foundations of Yoga and Ayurveda, each product line is made with intention, led by the wisdom of ancient cultures, and crafted seasonally through sustainable practices. All goods are socially and spiritually motivated -- designed to honor the journey within.
